class.name: UnixSurfaceManagerFactory
class.javadoc: The SurfaceManagerFactory that creates VolatileSurfaceManager implementations for the Unix volatile images.

Creates a new instance of a VolatileSurfaceManager given any arbitrary SunVolatileImage. An optional context Object can be supplied as a way for the caller to pass pipeline-specific context data to the VolatileSurfaceManager (such as a backbuffer handle, for example). For Unix platforms, this method returns either an X11- or a GLX- specific VolatileSurfaceManager based on the GraphicsConfiguration under which the SunVolatileImage was created.
